attributes.action: Pass apprentices that are involved with an apprenticeship involving EPA’s.
attributes.additional_details: Allow under the certain circumstances to pass any apprentices that has to undertake an EPA as part of their apprenticeship, as long as all work is up to date and they have passed their online exams and professional discussion. Some of us have been waiting over half a year to proceed and with more lockdowns and stricter tiers, it’s becoming near impossible to pass.
attributes.background: EPA’s are getting pushed bath further and further due to COVID 19 and it is unfair on the apprentices that a waiting to do their EPA’s. These delays are effecting apprentices pays, futures, mental health  and lives.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567003
